s0001.literal: First year, spring, first month, edict said: 'Previously Emperor Hui wished to abolish the three clans punishment and the demonic words ordinance; discussion was not decided when he passed away; now abolish them.'
s0001.idiomatic: In the first year, spring, first month, an imperial edict declared: 'Previously Emperor Hui wished to abolish the punishment of three clans and the ordinance against demonic words; discussion remained undecided when he passed away, so now we abolish them.'

s0002.literal: Second month, granted the people nobility ranks, each household one level.
s0002.idiomatic: In the second month, nobility ranks were granted to the people, one level per household.

s0003.literal: Initially established one person at 2000 shi who was filial, fraternal, and diligent in farming.
s0003.idiomatic: For the first time, one official position at 2000 shi was established for those who were filial, fraternal, and diligent in agriculture.

s0004.literal: Summer, fifth month, Bingshen day, the Zhao King palace Cong Terrace disaster.
s0004.idiomatic: Summer, fifth month, on the day Bingshen, a fire disaster struck the Cong Terrace in the Zhao King's palace.

s0005.literal: 立孝惠後宮子為淮陽王，非正也。
s0005.idiomatic: She established Emperor Hui's harem son as King of Huaiyang, though he was not legitimate.
